00036 void Options_menu::Render()
00037 {
00038     ALLEGRO_COLOR green = al_map_rgba_f(0, 0.5, 0, 1);
00039     ALLEGRO_COLOR bright = al_map_rgba_f(0.25, 0.75, 0.25, 1);
00040         ALLEGRO_FONT* font = game->Get_font();
00041 
00042         int fh = 20;
00043         int y, cx;
00044 
00045         /* Center horizontally */
00046         cx = al_get_display_width() / 2;
00047 
00048         /* Center vertically */
00049         y = al_get_display_height() / 2 - (fh * optionStrings.size()) / 2;
00050 
00051         if (font)
00052         {
00053                 int sizeOptions = optionStrings.size();
00054                 for (int selectionIndex = 0; selectionIndex < sizeOptions; ++selectionIndex)
00055                 {
00056                         al_set_blender(ALLEGRO_ALPHA, ALLEGRO_INVERSE_ALPHA, (option == selectionIndex) ? bright : green );
00057                         al_font_textout_centre(font, cx, y + fh * selectionIndex,
00058                                                                    optionStrings[selectionIndex].c_str(), -1);
00059                 }
00060 
00061                 al_set_blender(ALLEGRO_ALPHA, ALLEGRO_INVERSE_ALPHA, bright );
00062                 al_font_textout_centre(font, cx - 120, y + fh * option, "▶⚔", -1);
00063                 al_font_textout_centre(font, cx + 120, y + fh * option, "⚔◀", -1);
00064 /*              al_font_textout(font, "Some unicode symbols:", 50, 240);
00065                 al_font_textout(font, "■□▢▣▤▥▦▧▨▩▪▫▬▭▮▯▰▱", 50, 260);
00066                 al_font_textout(font, "▲△▴▵▷▸▹►▻▼▽▾▿◀◁◂◃◄◅◆◇◈◉◊", 50, 280);
00067                 al_font_textout(font, "○◌◍◎●◐◑◒◓◔◕◖◗◘◙", 50, 300);
00068 */      }
00069         al_set_blender(ALLEGRO_ALPHA, ALLEGRO_INVERSE_ALPHA, al_map_rgba_f(1, 1, 1, 1));
00070 }

00073 game_event_n Options_menu::Event(ALLEGRO_EVENT event)
00074 {
00075         game_event_n ret = GAME_EVENT_NONE;
00076 
00077         if (event.type == ALLEGRO_EVENT_KEY_DOWN)
00078         {
00079                 switch (event.keyboard.keycode)
00080                 {
00081                 case ALLEGRO_KEY_UP:
00082                         --option;
00083                         if (option < 0)
00084                         {
00085                                 option = optionStrings.size() - 1;
00086                         }
00087                         break;
00088                         
00089                 case ALLEGRO_KEY_DOWN:
00090                         ++option;
00091                         if (option >= (int)optionStrings.size())
00092                         {
00093                                 option = 0;
00094                         }
00095                         break;
00096                 case ALLEGRO_KEY_ENTER:
00097                 case ALLEGRO_KEY_SPACE:
00098                         Monday_out(VERBOSE_LEVEL2, std::cout, "Options menu - press option %d\n", option);
00099                         switch (option)
00100                         {
00101                         case 0:
00102                                 ret = GAME_EVENT_KEYBOARD_MENU;
00103                                 break;
00104                                 
00105                         case 1:
00106                                 ret = GAME_EVENT_MAIN_MENU;
00107                                 break;
00108                                 
00109                         case 2:
00110                                 ret = GAME_EVENT_EXIT;
00111                                 break;
00112                                 
00113                         default:
00114                                 break;
00115                         }
00116                         break;
00117                         
00118                 default:
00119                         break;
00120                 }
00121         }
00122         return ret;
00123 }
